location: 安和仁愛 (Anhe Ren'ai area), Beitou District
notes: Brand new, unfurnished apartment in a modern high-rise (27-floor) building with exposed ceiling pipes giving a loft-style feel. Very clean with polished tile floors, modern bathroom with glass shower enclosure and stone countertop. The unit is completely empty which is good for baby-proofing from scratch, but note the exposed ceiling pipes and the slippery polished tile floors could be concerns. Good natural light from large windows in the bedrooms; no balcony visible which is actually safer for a child, but the glass shower door edges would need attention as the baby grows.
